entry.title: Friday night: Periods of light snow. Low minus 33.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Periods of light snow beginning early this evening and ending late this evening. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 33. Wind chill near minus 43. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 2:00 PM MST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.title: Saturday: Mainly cloudy. Temperature steady near minus 30.
